name: TestsForMycobacteriumSpeciesNucleicAcidInUnspecifiedXXXSpecimen
title: Tests for Mycobacterium species Nucleic Acid in Unspecified XXX Specimen
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mycobacterium species in nucleic acid testing.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Mycobacterium, nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: Mycobacterium tuberculosis)
